contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of October, 1996, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted. The Order of the Superior Court is vacated and the Order of the common pleas court dated October 5, 1993, is reinstated. See Commonwealth v. Matos, 543 Pa. 449, 672 A.2d 769 (1996).
